title: Bengkelin
body: Android application for booking nearby workshop based on user location and analyze tire condition using machine learning

title: Dicostory
body: Android application for sharing user's stories like instagram

title: Githubers
body: Android application for checking others github profile like followers, following, and number of public repos

title: EatMe
body: Web application using Progressive Web Apps (PWA) for exploring restaurants

title: Shoot it!
body: Web application for playing shooting game using vanilla javascript

title: ChatanKuy!
body: Web application for chatting anonymously with other peoples using React.js and Firebase
